import React from 'react' import { Button, Form,Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; function Update({el}) { // edit film const[input2,setInput2]=useState( {Title :el.Title, Genre:el.Genre, Img :el.Img, } ) const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return(
{/* strat modal */} <> Edit
Title Genre Img
) {/* end modal */} } export default Update
